name: Horror School: The Classroom
storyline:
In this Japanese horror game, players assume the role of the high school girls Sakura and her neighbor who finds themselves trapped inside the haunted school after hours. They're the famous livestreamer that takes horror video mods to gain money for paying all their debt from the online loan. Armed with only a flickering flashlight, they must navigate the dark hallways, classrooms, and deserted corridors while adventuring the mysteries of the school's sinister past in the dark.

As the night progresses, alone you will encounter a cast of chilling characters, each with their own thrill stories and terrifying secrets. Use your ouija board from your teacher to meet vengeful spirits squad like creepy monsters, spooky clown, yandere granny, toilet head, dead pocong, white lady kuntilanak, yellow baby ghost, or even evil poppy head on every corner holds a new nightmare waiting to be discovered.
summary: Say hello to the eerie world of "Horror School: A Scary School Simulator Story," a first person anime horror game set in an abandoned classrooms at midnight. As the clock strikes twelve, the corridors come alive with malevolent squad and scary playtime lurking in the shadows.
